metadata.subject: Using CRISPR to resurrect the dead

relationships.description: Flipboard sending curated news content to subscriber

analysis.purpose: To deliver curated news content and promote Flipboard service
analysis.significance: Shows Jeffrey Epstein's email account receiving mainstream news content about various topics including politics, technology, and science

notable_quotes: 'My whole life is a bet,' the President of the United States says, resting his forearms on the edge of the Resolute desk in the Oval Office.
De-extinction, bringing extinct species back from the dead, is now on the table thanks to the revolutionary gene-editing technology CRISPR.
Slack is coming for your job. The workplace chat company, valued at more than $7 billion at the time of its last funding round, is going public this...

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found - this is a standard news newsletter email

illegal_activity.description: This is a newsletter containing links to news articles from various publications - no first-hand illegal activity discussed

details: Multiple news articles from Time, CNET, New York Times, MIT Technology Review, National Geographic, Money.com, Gizmodo, Curbed, Harper's Bazaar, and Outside Online

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a standard news aggregation email from Flipboard containing publicly available news articles from major publications

analysis.summary: This is a Flipboard newsletter email sent to Jeffrey Epstein's email address containing curated news articles about various topics including President Trump's re-election strategy, CRISPR technology, Slack's IPO, Iceland's data centers, summer solstice, planner enthusiasts, pest science, architectural acoustics, travel destinations, and adventure books.
